title: Harry Winks set to make spot at the base of England's midfield his own after Sofia masterclass
text:
Harry Winks is about to make the role at the base of England's midfield his own.

The Tottenham player made his first competitive international start for 12 months in Monday's Euro 2020 qualification win over Bulgaria and was impressive.

Manager Gareth Southgate and his coaching staff believe Winks' calm display was one of the keys to their excellent 6-0 victory.

Harry Winks is about to make the role at the base of England's midfield his own

Winks' team-mates also felt England benefited from having someone with his technical ability sitting in front of the back four.

With Jordan Henderson suspended for the qualifier against Montenegro, Winks looks likely to keep his place for Wembley, where another good performance could cement his place in the starting XI going into the European Championship.
description: Harry Winks is about to make the role at the base of England's midfield his own. Gareth Southgate and his coaching staff believe Winks' calm display against Bulgaria was key for the big victory.
authors: Sami Mokbel For The Daily Mail
